metadata.description: Before he was a name on special agent Dave Kujan's wall, Keyser Soze was a watchword in the criminal underworld, the ultimate boogeyman.  In this prequel to the hit film The Usual Suspects, set against the backdrop of the Iran-Contra hearings, find out how Soze earned his reputation and how he first came to the attention of the U.S. Government.
metadata.name: Keyser Soze: Scorched Earth
